titles.title: A bill to provide assistance to Pakistan under certain conditions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 4/28/2009--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize the President to use specified funds for assistance to Pakistan upon a determination that to do so is in U.S. national security interests. Terminates authority under this Act on September 30, 2010.
